Multi-Spin 1.description: Rolls 3 items at once for 1 roll.

Multi-Spin 2.description: Rolls 6 items at once for 1 roll.

Multi-Spin 3.description: Rolls 10 items at once for 1 roll.

Luck 1.description: Increases your chance of getting rare items slightly for 1 roll.

Luck 2.description: Increases your chance of getting rare items moderately for 1 roll.

Luck 3.description: Increases your chance of getting rare items strongly for 1 roll.

Transmutate 1.description: Evolves the next item you roll into its evolution.

Transmutate 2.description: Evolves the next item you roll into its 2nd evolution.

Transmutate 3.description: Evolves the next item you roll into its 3rd evolution.

Godly.description: Gives you a big luck boost for 1 roll.
